transcript:
Customer: Time bataiye na.

Hello?
Executive: Hello. Good afternoon sir.
Customer: Good afternoon.
Executive: Sir, mai Gitika baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART head office se.
Customer: Ha Gitika ji boliye.
Executive: Sir, aapke account manager baat kar rahi hu. Aapko abhi kuch problem aa rahi hai sir hamari services me bataiye?
Customer: Wo hakikat hai ki hamare relevant lead nahi aa rahe hai abhi tak.
Executive: Accha, abhi sir aap free hai kya? Hum Google Meet pe connect kar sakte hai aapko agar mai screen pe sari cheeze present karti toh zyada sahi rehta.
Customer: Nahi aap mere ko aise bhi bata sakte hai.
Executive: Sir actually na aapke jaise abhi services bhi abhi live hui hai newly toh use kaise use karte hai sari cheeze screen pe hi sir zyada clearly samjha paungi isiliye mai aapko bol rahi hu.
Executive: Aur aapne concern bhi raise kara tha aapne matlab apne mail bhi dala tha call bhi kara tha ki aapko kuch buyleads me problem aa rahi hai toh wo sari cheeze sir discuss kar lenge. Abhi agar free hai abhi bata dijiye warna aap koi time bata dijiye jab bhi aap free ho mai aapko connect kar paungi.
Customer: Ha mai aapko message kar dunga jab mai free rahunga.
Executive: Matlab aaj me ho jayega na sir mai aapko whatsapp pe message drop kar deti hu ek apne mere number se aap usi number pe mere ko connect kar lijiyega aur fir bhi around kitne time tak mai apne hamari jo meeting hai schedule kar sakti hu kuch idea hai aapko?
Customer: Shaam ho jayegi bhai.
Executive: Shaam ko 4 baje ka kar du sir?
Customer: Ha 4-5 baje jab mai kar dunga na aapko free rahunga jab tak.
Executive: Thik hai 4 baje na sir?
Customer: Hmm, nahi hum kar denge message aapko pehle.
Executive: Thik hai abhi mai aapko message drop kar deti hu just like Gitika karke whatsapp me aapka same number hai whatsapp pe?
Customer: Ji ji ji.
Executive: Thik hai sir abhi mai message drop kar rahi hu otherwise aap mere ko bata dijiyega jab bhi free honge ek baar mai 4 baje bhi aapko connect kar lungi thik hai sir?
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Thik hai sir thank you.
Customer: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting relevant buyleads.



Resolution:

- Executive offered a Google Meet session.

- Executive will drop a WhatsApp message.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will message when free.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, google meet, schedule, whatsapp
